login.title: Murakaza neza
login.invalidCredentials: Imeyili cyangwa ijambo ry'ibanga si ryo

maize.name: Ibigori
maize.info: Ibigori bikura neza mu butaka bwiza butanduye. Bitera mu ntangiriro y'imvura. Ibibazo bisanzwe birimo inyenzi z'igitondo.

cassava.name: Imyumbati
cassava.info: Imyumbati ihangana n'umuhindu. Ikura neza mu mbuga. Ikusanywa nyuma y'amezi 8-12.

sweetPotato.name: Ibijumba
sweetPotato.info: Ibijumba bikunda ubushyuhe n'ubutaka bworoheje. Ikusanywa nyuma y'amezi 3-5.

vegetables.name: Imboga
vegetables.info: Imboga isaba kuhira buri gihe n'ifumbire y'umwimerere. Ikusanywa kenshi kugira ngo umusaruro ube mwiza.
